st: Kahne Ko Roj Niklata Hai Suraj Lekin,
s:
Kahne Ko Roj Niklata Hai Suraj Lekin,
Mere Jeevan Mein Kyu Sada Se Andhera Hai,

Kya Kabhi Na Chhantegi Yeh Kali Raat Moula,
Kya Mere Naseeb Mein Na Likha Savera Hai…

st: Mujhe Apnana Na Kabhi Tum Yaaro,
s:
Mujhe Apnana Na Kabhi Tum Yaaro,
Mani Bahut Hi Badnaseeb Hun Yaaro,

Mere Paas Kuchh Nahi Hai Ghamon Ke Shiwa,
Bas Mout Ke Hi Kareeb Hun Yaaro…

st: Agar Yakin Hota Ki Kahne Se Ruk Jaayenge,
s:
Agar Yakin Hota Ki Kahne Se Ruk Jaayenge,
Toh Hum Bhi Hanskar Unko Pukaar Lete,

Magar Naseeb Ko Yeh Manjoor Nahi Tha,
Ki Hum Bhi Do Pal Khusi Se Gujar Lete…

st: Koi Toh Hota Jo Samjhata Sagar Ko,
s:
Koi Toh Hota Jo Samjhata Sagar Ko,
Ki Yahan Kisi Se Na Pyar Karna Chahiye,
Koi Bhi Nahi Banta Kisi Ka Apna,
Yahan Kisi Par Na Aitbaar Karna Chahiye…

st: Jo Jakham De Gaye Aap Sagar Ko,
s:
Jo Jakham De Gaye Aap Sagar Ko,
Na Jaane Kyun Woh Jakham Nahi Bharta,
Hum Toh Milna Chahte Hain Aapse Magar,
Kya Karein Hamara Naseeba Nahi Milta….

st: Jaise Julfon Ki Lat Hai Chehre Ke Karib Tere,
s:
Jaise Julfon Ki Lat Hai Chehre Ke Karib Tere,
Kaash Hum Bhi Aaj Tere Itne Karib Hote,

Tere Phulon Se Chehre Ko Hardam Niharte Hum,
Kaash Aisi Hoti Kismat Aise Naseeb Hote…

st: Ismein Aapki Khata Bhi Kya Bataun Main,
s:
Ismein Aapki Khata Bhi Kya Bataun Main,
Hamare Naseeb Mein Hi Aapka Saath Nahi Hai,

Varna Sagar Ki Dosti Ko Yun Thukraate,
Aisi Toh Yahan Par Koi Bhi Baat Nahi Hai…

st: Kuchh Majburiyon Ne Humko Rok Rakha Hai,
s:
Kuchh Majburiyon Ne Humko Rok Rakha Hai,
Varna Hum Toh Kya Se Kya Kar Jaate,

Ek Naseeb Bhi Abhi Nahi Hai Saath Hamaare,
Varna Kya Hum Is Jamaane Se Dar Jaate…

st: Pa Liya Tha Duniya Ki Sabse Hansi Ko,
s:
Pa Liya Tha Duniya Ki Sabse Hansi Ko,
Is Baat Ka Toh Hamein Kabhi Garur Nahi Tha,

Woh Paas Rah Paate Sagar Ke Kuchh Aur Din,
Shayad Yeh Hamare Naseeb Ko Manjoor Nahi Tha…

st: Tumne bhi kam naseeb par kuch kam nigah ki
s:
Tumne bhi kam naseeb par kuch kam nigah ki
Usne toh khair zindagi apni tabaah ki,

Hum dono duniyadar nahi hain isliye
Surat koi najar nahi aati nibaah ki,

Halaat bewafayi par majbur kar gaye
Varna use bhi chah bahut thi nibaah ki,

Apne ko rask e meer samjhate hain badr ji
Gumraah kar gayi hai sada wah wah ki…

st: Do Bhatkati Huyi Roohein Jaise Mili,
s:
Do Bhatkati Huyi Roohein Jaise Mili,
Yun Mili Woh Nigahein Magar Khouf Hai,

Jist Hai Raat Mein Jangalon Ka Safar,
Is Janam Mein Bhi Hum Kho Na Jaayein Kahin,

Roshni Ke Naseeb Mein Neendein Kahan,
Chaand Mein Taak Par Woh Sajayein Kahan,

Hum Chirag E Wafa Jalna Hai Raat Bhar,
Aasman Doudbhag Mein Woh Jalayein Kahin,

Minar Ke Jaise Shohratein Hamein,
Aasmaa Ki Taraf Le Chali Hain Magar,

Ji Mein Hai Sabj Paigambron Ki Tarah,
Seena E Sang Se Sar Uthayen Kahin…

st: Irade Toh The Magar Mouka Na Aaya,
s:
Irade Toh The Magar Mouka Na Aaya,
Chalo Duniya Ne Toh Mera Geet Gaya,

Yahi Toh Hain Dil Dukhane Wali Baatein,
Tumhare Rahte Mujhe Sab Ne Sataya,

Raste Par Khada Tha Mera Naseeb,
Aaye Jaate Huon Ne Thokar Lagaya,

Gila Shikwa Nahi Hai Koi Kisi Se,
Chalo Uske Hathon Hi Apna Safaya….

st: Naseeb Ko Samjhna Hai Bada Muskil,
s:
Naseeb Ko Samjhna Hai Bada Muskil,
Raaten Roti Savere Gaate Hi Hain,

Dogale Makkaron Se Hai Bhari Duniya,
Kamine Afvaah Failate Hi Hain,

Sidhe Sadhe Aadmi Ko Loot Lenge,
Bure Achhon Par Sitam Dhate Hi Hain,

Kitne Bhi Badnamiyo Ke Teer Maarein,
Jeetne Par Haar Pahnaate Hi Hai…

st: Aisa Bhi Koi Dard Se Behal Kyu Hua,
s:
Aisa Bhi Koi Dard Se Behal Kyu Hua,
Ki Ranjo Gham Ke Putle Ko Malal Kyu Hua,

Apne Hi Bojh Se Nahin Tuta Hai Aasman,
Apne Gunahon Ka Nahin Khyal Kyu Hua,

Woh Gaay Charata Tha Jangal Ke Kinaron Par,
Man Moh Lene Wala Hi Gopal Kyu Hua,

Dil Se Nilkalne Wali Baatein Ajib Hoti,
Apna Hi Ilam Ji Ka Janjal Kyu Hua,

Har Aadmi Ka Naseeb Hota Nahi Barabar,
Sabko Saman Karne Fir Bawal Kyu Hua…

st: Fir Bhi Achha Kahoge,
s:
Fir Bhi Achha Kahoge,
Gair Ko Tum,
Imtehaan Mein Agar,
Bura Nikla,

st: Jo Hain Ishara Faham,
s:
Jo Hain Ishara Faham,
Samajhte Hain Be Kahe,
Nikla Hai Kaam Daag Ka,
Aksar Kahe Bagair…

st: Duniya Mein Koi,
s:
Duniya Mein Koi,
Iska Kharidar Hi Nahin,
Main Bechta Jaroor,
Jo Bikta Mera Naseeb,

st: Inkaar Ke Woh Tarike Ke Dil Muft Mein Mil Jaaye,
s:
Inkaar Ke Woh Tarike Ke Dil Muft Mein Mil Jaaye,
Andaaj Nirale Hain Tere Husne Talab Ke,

Sote Nahin Is Vaham Se Woh Bistar Par Gull,
Daale Tane Naajuk Pe Nisha Phool Ne Dab Ke,

Mujhko Toh Sabbe Vasal Mein Is Vaham Ne Ghera,
Tujhse Yun Hi Armaan Nikal Jaayenge Sab Ke,

Ab Apne Naseeb Ki Tum Khair Manao,
Bas Daag Maje Loot Chuke Aisho Tarab Ke…

st: Rakhe Jo Hoshiyaar Woh Sohbat Mein Chahiye,
s:
Rakhe Jo Hoshiyaar Woh Sohbat Mein Chahiye,
Mera Rakeeb Hi Meri Sohbat Mein Chahiye,

Jalwe Ka Tere Noor Basarat Mein Chahiye,
Aisa Chirage Raah Mohabbat Mein Chahiye,

Sanam Royenge Ghame Maashuk Mein Bahut,
Matamkada Bhi Ghosa Eh Jannat Mein Chahiye,

Hajir Yeh Badnaseeb Badle Hain Rakeeb Ke,
Koi Na Koi Aapki Khidmat Mein Chahiye…

st: Hamne Laal Ki Aankhe Yaar Ke Liye,
s:
Hamne Laal Ki Aankhe Yaar Ke Liye,
Deedar Wale Jaayenge Deedar Ke Liye,

Kuchh Khun E Dil Hai Deed E Khubar Ke Liye,
Kuchh Hai Bacha Khucha Ghamo Aajar Ke Liye,

Tarsi Jab Aankh Jalwa E Deedar Ke Liye,
Bose Hain Humne Rojne Deevar Ke Liye,

Kya Haale Dil Kahun Ke Teri Chasmein Khasmagi,
Hai Mohre Khamushi Labe Ijhaar Ke Liye,

Hota Hai Jalwa Faroshon Se Kya Naseeb,
Do Char Galiya Hai Kharidar Ke Liye…

st: Raham Dili Toh Dushman Ko Bhi Naseeb Na Ho,
s:
Raham Dili Toh Dushman Ko Bhi Naseeb Na Ho,
Mera Rakib Bhi Roya Gale Laga Ke Mujhe,

Kaha Yeh Dil Ne Mujhe Chalo Aaj Ku-E-Kaatil Mein,
Ajal Kahan Se Kahan Le Gayi Laga Ke Mujhe,

Har Ik Shaks Ko Haasil Juda Hai Haalchal,
Jafa Ke Lutf Tujhe Hain Maje Wafa Ke Mujhe,

Sitam Toh Yeh Ke Fir Is Khusi Ki Kadar Nahin,
Tum Apne Dil Mein Hi Khus Kis Kadar Sata Ke Mujhe,

Gajab Hai Aah Meri Daag Naam Hai Tera,
Taman Sahar Jalaoge Kya Jala Ke Mujhe…

st: Adam Ko Chale Jaayenge Hijar Mein Hum,
s:
Adam Ko Chale Jaayenge Hijar Mein Hum,
Akele Rahenge Akele Rahe Hain,

Mohabbat Mein Achha Nahin Doud Lagana,
Jo Aage Chale Hain Pichhe Rahe Hain,

Naseeb Se Milta Hai Dard E Mohabbat,
Yahan Marne Waale Hi Ache Rahe Hain,

Gayi Daag Ke Saath Mehr O Mohabbat,
Fakat Ab Toh Daave Hi Daave Rahe Hain….

st: Hamne Toh Unse Sada Ki Wafa,
s:
Hamne Toh Unse Sada Ki Wafa,
Fir Unhone Kyu Ki Bewafayi,

Jitna Hamne Bhulana Chaha Unhe,
Woh Utna Hi Dil Ko Yaad Aayi,

Sote Hain Log, Bhala Aasiq Kab Sote Hain,
Bath Ke Tanha Raato Mein Nasibo Par Rote Hain,

Aa Jaye Woh Jisko Dil Yaad Karta Hai Yaaro,
Aal Ke Asko Ke Kab Naseeb Eise Hota Hain…

st: Pal Do Pal Ki Kismat Hai,
s:
Pal Do Pal Ki Kismat Hai,
Na Jaane Kab Bikhar Jaau,

Mat Dekh Mujhe In Najron Se,
Na Jaane Kab Main Gir Jaau,

Humne Tamam Umar Akele Safar Kiya,
Hum Par Kisi Khuda Ki Inayat Nahin…

st: Bhanwara Gulshan Mein Foolo Ka Maja Leta Hai,
s:
Bhanwara Gulshan Mein Foolo Ka Maja Leta Hai,
Kaliyo Ko Dekhta Hai Intezar Ki Najron Se,

Baharein Toh Aayengi Aura Chali Jayengi Sanam,
Bhanwara Wahin Rahega Jahan Gulshan Hai Uska,

Na Kuchh Hum Samajhe Na Tum Samajhe,
Isq Ho Gaya,
Tumhaare Naseeeb Se Ya Hamaare Naseeb Se,

Mohabbat Ko Chhupane Se Ghabrahat Hoti Hai,
Juba Se Nahi To Najro Se Hi Bayaa Kar Do…

st: Wo Koun Hai Jo Mera Habib Hoga,
s:
Wo Koun Hai Jo Mera Habib Hoga,
Jiske Hathon Mein Mera Naseeb Hoga,

Koi Humein Pyar Kare Koi Badi Baat Nahin,
Jise Hum Pyar Karen Woh Bahut Hi Khushnaseeb Hoga..

st: Ah Jaalimo Apne Naseeb Pe Itna Naaaj,
s:
Ah Jaalimo Apne Naseeb Pe Itna Naaaj,
Na Karo, Vakt Toh Badlata Hi Rahta Hai,

Woh Sunega Yakinan Duaayen, Akele Hi,
Kya Khuda Sirf Tumhara Hai Hamara Nahin,

Ab Chala Hu Ghar Se Yeh Sochkar,
Ke Is Saahil Ka Koi Kinara Nahin,

Doonduga Use Ab Is Najar Se,
Na Pa Saka Toh Ab Koi Najara Nahin…

st: Dekh Kar Tanha,
s:
Dekh Kar Tanha,
Mujhse Pucha Bahaaron Ne,

Kaha Gaya Tera Woh Hamsafar,
Tujhe To Bada Naaz Tha Uspar,

Yeh Dekh Kar Main Chup Rahaa,

Par Mere Aansuon Ne Jawab Diya,
Milna Kismat, Bichhadna Naseeb Tha,

Woh Mujhse Itna Door Ho Gaya,
Jitna Woh Mere Kareeb Tha…

st: Niyat Teri Achhi Hai,
s:
Niyat Teri Achhi Hai,
To Naseeb Teri Dasi Hai,

Karam Tere Ache Hain To,
Ghar Mein Mathura Kasi Hai…

st: Ek Ajib Dastan Hai,
s:
Ek Ajib Dastan Hai,
Mere Afsaane Ki,

Maine Pal Pal Ki Kosish,
Uske Pass Jaane Ki,

Naseeb The Meri Ya,
Sajish Jamaane Ki,

Door Huyi Mujhse Itna,
Jitni Umeed Thi Kareeb Aane Ki…

st: Kuchh Pathar Mein Phool Khil Jaate Hain,
s:
Kuchh Pathar Mein Phool Khil Jaate Hain,
Kuchh Anjane Bhi Apne Ban Jaate Hain,

Is Kaatil Duniya Mein,
Kuchh Laash Ko,

Kafan Bhi Naseeb Nahin Hote,
To Kuchh Laash Par Tajjmahal Ban Jaaate Hain…

st: Jeena Chahte Hain Magar,
s:
Jeena Chahte Hain Magar,
Zindagi Raas Nahi Aati,

Marna Chahte Hain Magar,
Maut Paas Nahi Aati,

Bahut Udaas Hain Hum,
Is Zindagi Se,

Naseeb Bhi Tadpaane Se,
Baaz Nahin Aati…

st: Har Raah Pe Unko Jeet Mile,
s:
Har Raah Pe Unko Jeet Mile,

Dil Ko Madhur Sangeet Mile,

Andheri Raahen Bhi Ho Jaati Hain Roshan,

Jinko Naseeb Me Aisa Dost Manmeet Mile…

st: Yun Banaa Apne Aap Ko Kaabil,
s:
Yun Banaa Apne Aap Ko Kaabil,

Ke Khudaa Se Bhi Kah Sakein Yeh,

Ab Dekhtaa Hun Tere Naseeb Ka,

Mujhe Hisaab Karna Kya Hai…

st: Pyar Ke Ujaale Me Gham Ka Andhera Aata Kyun Hai,
s:
Pyar Ke Ujaale Me Gham Ka Andhera Aata Kyun Hai,
Jise Hum Chahte Hain Wahi Rulata Kyun Hai,
Agar Woh Meri Naseeb Nahin Toh,
Bhagwan Aise Logo Se Milata Hi Kyun Hai…

st: Maangi Thi Mot To Zindgi Mil Gayi,
s:
Maangi Thi Mot To Zindgi Mil Gayi,
Andhere me bhi mujhe roshni mil gayi,
Poocha khuda se naseeb me kiya hai mere,
To sabse haseen tohfa Aapki Friendship Mil Gayi…

st: aisa bhi din aayega kabhi socha na tha
s:
aisa bhi din aayega kabhi socha na tha
mera saaya hi mujhse bichhad jaayega kabhi socha na tha
wo insaan  jo tha meri har muskaan ki wajah
mujhe tanha rotaa hua chhod jaayega kabhi socha na tha
jannat jaisa tha har lamha jiske saath se
uska khayaal mujhe tadpaayega kabhi socha na tha..
samajhta tha khud ko khushnaseeb tu aye Rajan
tera naseeb hi tujhse rooth jaayega kabhi socha na tha…

st: Aye khudaa agar mujhe fir is jahaan me laana
s:
Aye khudaa agar mujhe fir is jahaan me laana

mera yaar mujhe todey mujhe wo phool banaana..

ya bana dena mujhe uske kamrey ka chiraag

taanki naseeb ho unke ujaaley ke liye jal jaana..

agar na bana sake tu mujhe wo chiraag ya phool

to kam se kam bana dena uss rastey ki dhool

jis rastey se  hai ” RAJAN” ki jaan ka aana jaana

st: Khusiyo Se Hamari Duniya Jala Kerti Thi,
s:
Khusiyo Se Hamari Duniya Jala Kerti Thi,
Haatho Me Haath Jab Tum Saath Chala Kerti Thi,
Ab Duniya Wale Kerte Hai Hum Se Itefaq,
Ke Her Aashiq Ka Hua Hai Pyar Me Bura Haal,
Itrateh The Hum Apne Naseeb Per,
Ab Manaate Hai Maatam Apni Takdeer Per,
Phir Bhi Hum Teri Bewafaiyo Ko Bhool Jaateh,
Agar Tum Apni Yaadon Ko Apne Saath Le Jaateh,
Jab Bhi Khusiya Aayi Zindagi Mein Banker Savera,
Tab-Tab Tumhari Di Gam-E-Tanhaiyo Ne Usko Ghera…

st: Na Chaaho Itna Hame, Chahaton Se Dar Lagta Hai
s:
Na Chaaho Itna Hame, Chahaton Se Dar Lagta Hai
Na Aao Itna Kareeb, Judai Se Dar Lagta Hai
Tumhari Wafaon Pe Bharosa Hai
Magar Apne Naseeb Se Dar Lagta Hai

st: Khamosh Guzar Jate Hain Woh Kareeb Se
s:
Khamosh Guzar Jate Hain Woh Kareeb Se
Sawal Uthte Hain Dil Mein Ajeeb Se
Woh Khafa Hain Ya Ye Unki Ada Hai
Shikayat Bhi Kya Karein Apne Naseeb Se…

st: Is Raat Ne, Sitaro Ne Ek Nai Duniya Dikhai
s:
Is Raat Ne, Sitaro Ne Ek Nai Duniya Dikhai
Us Duniya Me Bhi Tera Chehra Hi Dikha
Aaj B Mita Na Ske Us Tasvir Ko Dil Se
Jo Teri Chaht Me Is Dil Me Thi Basayi
Tum To Chle Gye, “Bhul Jao” Hume Keh kar
Tere Jane Ke Baad Bhi Ye Aankhe Tujhe Bhul Na Payi
Sara Jaha Rakh Diya Tha Kadmo Me Tumhare
Aakhir Kya Kami Reh Gyi Thi Chaht Me Hamari
K Tumne Jate Jate Likhi Humare Naseeb Me Ruswai Aur Tanhai…

st: Na Jaane Wo Kaun Tera Habeeb Hoga
s:
Na Jaane Wo Kaun Tera Habeeb Hoga
Tere Hatho Mein Jiska Naseeb Hoga
Koi Tumhe Chahe Ye Koi Badi Baat Nahi
Jisko Tum Chaho Wo Khush Naseeb Hoga…

st: Khamosh Guzar Jate Hain Wo Kareeb Se
s:
Khamosh Guzar Jate Hain Wo Kareeb Se
Sawal Uth Te Hain Dil Mein Ajeeb Se
Wo Khafa Hai Ya Ye Unki Ada Hai
Shikayat Bhi Kya Kare Apne Naseeb Se…

st: Kabhi Chirag Kabhi Roshni Se Haar Gaye
s:
Kabhi Chirag Kabhi Roshni Se Haar Gaye
Hum Badnaseeb The Har Kisi Se Haar Gaye
Ajeeb Khel Ka Maidan Hai Ye Dunia
Jisko Jeet Chuke The Usi Se Haar Gaye…

st: Aarzu Thi Meri Ki Unka Har Din Mere Sath Khushi Se Nikle
s:
Aarzu Thi Meri Ki Unka Har Din Mere Sath Khushi Se Nikle
Kasoor Unka Nahi Badnaseeb Hum Nikle
Ki Unki Khushi To Nahi
Par Har Gam Ki Wajah Hum Nikle

st: Voh Kehte Hain Ki Agar Naseeb Hoga Mera
s:
Voh Kehte Hain Ki Agar Naseeb Hoga Mera
To Hum Unhe Zaroor Payenge
Hum Puchte Hain Unse, Agar Hum Badnaseeb Hue
To Unke Bina Kaise Jee Payenge

st: Voh Kehte Hain Ki Agar Naseeb Hoga Mera
s:
Voh Kehte Hain Ki Agar Naseeb Hoga Mera
To Hum Unhe Jaroor Payenge
Hum Puchhte Hain Unse
Agar Hum Badnaseeb Hue To Unke Bina Kaise Jee Payenge

st: Palbhar Ki Bhi Tanhai Tujhe Naseeb Na Ho
s:
Palbhar Ki Bhi Tanhai Tujhe Naseeb Na Ho
Koi Bhi Gham Tere Kareeb Na Ho
Rab Teri Zindagi Mein Itni Khushiyan De
Ki Tujhse Badhkar Koi Khushnaseeb Na Ho
